backend/main.mo: Actor handling user profiles with authorization and storing inquiries, including submission by guests and admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables, radii, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component performing hash-based routing between marketing and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and error fallback.
frontend/src/components/Inquiry/InquiryF: Validated inquiry submission form with state management, field validation, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout component with header navigation, scroll helpers, optional admin link, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Marketing/Insura: Component rendering a detailed insurance info section with icons, coverage, target audience, and preparation info.
frontend/src/components/Marketing/Partne: Displays insurance partner companies in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/content/insuranceContent.ts: Defines insurance type interface and static data describing various insurance products.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Fetches, filters, and manages selection of inquiries from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Hook to submit a new inquiry through the backend actor with loading and error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Field-level validation utilities for form inputs such as name, phone, and message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page handling auth states, showing login or access denied screens, and rendering inquiry management for admins.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero, services, partners, and inquiry form sections, using scroll-based navigation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout settings for the project theme.
project_state.json: Project state file describing version, goals, features, requirements, and image assets for the insurance website.
